A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A little long and at times Disney's hand is very noticeable\, but in this movie they put the creativity in the story that was missing from the previous one to give some interesting twists in the plot. It's Star Wars of pure strain. A lot of lightsaber\, a lot of shots\, the Millennium Falcon doing \"his thing\". They fixed everything they did wrong in episode VII.
